channel.title: How can I fix this?
channel.description:
I got this error when trying to add a switching prayer altar iv been trying to fix for maybe.. 25 minutes and I cant.. Can anyone show me how or tell me how so I could fix it?
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:44: error: cannot find symbol c.getCurse().resetCurse(); ^ symbol: method getCurse() location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:36: error: cannot find symbol c.getCurse().activateCurse(5); ^ symbol: method getCurse() location: variable c of type Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: How can I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

src\server\model\players\Client.java:840: error: cannot find symbol
public Curse getCurse() {
^
symbol: class Curse
location: class Client
src\server\model\players\Client.java:841: error: cannot find symbol
return curse;
^
symbol: variable curse
location: class Client
2 errors
Sorry… I’m not very good with programming but I wrote the curses switching myself

Read full topic

item.title: How can I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

in client.java search for

under public Prayer getPrayer() { return prayer; }
add

public Curse getCurse() { return curse; }

Read full topic

item.title: How can I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

You’re missing a method in your client.java. You need to declare an int for your curses altar before you add that specific snippet.

Read full topic
